sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function AddUserForm(props) { let { handleSubmit, setName, setEmail, setGender, setStatus, errorMessage, setError } = props.addUserState; return (
< div className="new_user" >
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="example@test.com" />
setName(e.target.value)} value="Male" />
setName(e.target.value)} value="Female" />
setName(e.target.value)} name="status" value="Active" />
setName(e.target.value)} name="status" value="Inactive" />
{ errorMessage && { setError(undefined) }}> }
) }
